## How to Use

**How to Access this Book in Other Formats**

- **EPUB:** click <i class="bi bi-download"></i> in the left-hand sidebar
    - EPUB's benefits include accessibility, manipulability (via eReader options), dynamic media, interactivity, reflowable text, and offline reading
- **PDF:** click <i class="bi bi-download"></i> in the left-hand sidebar
    - PDF's benefits include printability of physical copies
- **Quarto Markdown (QMD):** click "<i class="bi bi-github"></i> View source" in the right-hand sidebar
    - QMD's benefits include reusability (revising, remixing, reformatting, repurposing, etc.) via a universal format
- **TeX:** click "<i class="bi bi-github"></i> View source" in the right-hand sidebar; then in the left-hand sidebar, select "Afterthought.tex"
    - (La)TeX's benefits include advanced document formatting and typesetting 

:::

**How to Report a Problem (Technological, Accessibility, Textual, Etc.) with this Book**

Click "Report an issue" in the right-hand sidebar of the [HTML version](https://iulibscholcomm.github.io/afterthought/); then complete and submit the bug report.  

::: {.content-visible unless-format="pdf" unless-format="epub"}

**To Learn More**

To learn more about how to use the HTML book, see [Quarto's Guide](https://quarto.org/docs/guide/), or try its features.

:::
